website_development.heading: Our Website Development Process
website_development.description: Every successful website starts with clarity. Our website development process is designed to reduce risk, improve outcomes, and ensure your site performs long after launch.

steps.title: Discovery & Strategy
steps.description: We begin by understanding your business, users, and objectives. This includes technical requirements, SEO considerations, conversion goals, and long-term scalability needs. The goal is alignment before design or development begins.

steps.title: UX, UI & Information Architecture
steps.description: We design user journeys, page structures, and interfaces that prioritise usability, clarity, and conversions. Every decision is informed by user intent, performance best practices, and SEO-friendly architecture.

steps.title: Website Development & Integration
steps.description: Our developers build your website using clean, scalable code and modern frameworks or CMS platforms. We integrate third-party tools, CMS functionality, and performance optimisation from the ground up.

steps.title: Testing, Performance & SEO Optimisation
steps.description: Before launch, we test across devices, browsers, and screen sizes. Performance, security, and technical SEO are reviewed to ensure fast load times, clean structure, and search-readiness.

steps.title: Launch, Support & Continuous Improvement
steps.description: Once live, we monitor performance and provide ongoing support, maintenance, and optimisation. As your business grows, your website evolves with it.
